## Documentation
This is a simple application for  prediction of son's height from father's height.
Prediction is based on linear regression model which was built using father.son dataset.

### How to use it..
Horizontal slider can be used to pick-up father's height. Slider's unit is 'inch'. 
Application provides  transformation to 'cm' unit. 
To predict son's height click 'Go!' button.
Scatter plot with father.son dataset is shown and predicted son's height for given father's height is represented by red lines.

Source code is available on the [GitHub](https://github.com/pkovar-git/DataProduct).
